name: 張怡敏
objective:
本課程敦請不同類屬之文化事業、創意產業之經營者，採產學協同教學模式，以實務操作和職能訓練為主要授課內容。旨在協助學生循序漸進，學習產業實務和相關應用技術，強化未來職場競爭力。
The main teaching content of this course is the practical operation and the functional training. We invite operators of cultural undertakings and the creative industries to help students learn industry practices and application of technology. This course is designed to strengthen students’ competitiveness in the future.
